Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored 10 straight clutch points and 37 overall to hand the Warriors a 120-117 close win
Miscellaneous Highlights: 400 Golden State Warriors employees welcomed Klay Thompson with the captain's hat on
The Warriors gave Thompson a video tribute which followed with a standing ovation from the Chase Center crowd
Others: Klay Thompson scored 22 points, had 4 rebounds, 3 assists, 0 steals, 0 blocks, 1 turnover, shot 7-17 from the field, 6-12 from 3-point range, and 2-2 from the free throw line
